Since most drug therapy is oral, the gastrointestinal tract plays a crucial role in drug absorption metabolism and pharmacokinetics.
[H2] Pharmacology (Osawa): Introduces the basic principles that govern absorption and metabolism of drugs.
Drug Disposition Drug Metabolism I, II and III
In addition to those recommended earlier,

Both should be viewed as supplementary and the lectures will not follow them directly but they cover the material. They are both paperbacks.
